title: Librarians
alt: Don't expect any leniencies on late fees, though.
transcript:
[Caption at the top:]
Advantages to dating librarians.[Megan and Cueball are standing together; Cueball is reaching inside a paper bag:]
Megan: We're stopping in Baltimore to visit my family, and that's final.
Cueball: Oh yeah?[Cueball is upright and is holding a book.]
Cueball: Hey, look, it's a new hardback book!
Megan: You wouldn't.[Cueball bends the book backwards.]
Book: crinkle[Cueball bends it back further.]
Book: creak
Megan: twitch[Cueball bends the book back still further.]
Book: crack
Megan: OKAY!
Megan: You win!
